text: Hao Haidong (born 25 August 1970) is a former Chinese football player. He has played for China PR national team. And has an Asian Club Championship in the old 26 goals. On 4 June 2020, Hao called for the overthrow of the Chinese Communist Party. He shared his views through a video, expressing his desire for democracy and freedom in China.
